info.name: Batch Management API
info.description: API collection for managing batch requests for discount codes and gift cards, including comprehensive reporting capabilities

request.description: Get all batch requests in the system

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
    "batchType": "GIFT_CARD",

    "totalCount": 50,
    "companyId": 1,
    "requestUserId": 1,

        {

item.name: Get Batches by Type (ADMIN or SUPERADMIN)

request.description: Get all batches of a specific type (DISCOUNT_CODE or GIFT_CARD)

item.name: Get Batches by Status (ADMIN or SUPERADMIN)

request.description: Get all batches with a specific status (PENDING, PROCESSING, COMPLETED, FAILED, CANCELLED)

item.name: Get Batches by Company (ADMIN or SUPERADMIN)

request.description: Get all batches for a specific company

item.name: Get Batches by User (ADMIN or SUPERADMIN)

request.description: Get all batches created by a specific user
